author: Special Correspondent
text:
The city police have arrested one more college student involved in chain snatching on Wednesday.

S. Vignesh (19) of Ahimsapuram, a second-year student of a city college, had attempted to snatch a gold chain of Sowmya (21) of Indira Nagar when she was walking back home after work around 3.30 p.m. on Wednesday.

“The woman suddenly realised that someone was closely following her. When she turned back, she found the youth trying to pounce on her to snatch the gold chain,” the police said. After preventing his attempt to yank the chain, she raised an alarm.

People in the vicinity tried to catch him. However, he escaped on a motorbike.

On being alerted, a police patrol team chased him and caught him at Athikulam.
title: Student held for chain snatching
